title: Does a Rioter play with you if you are on the brink of 1000 normal wins?
body: I was told to post on reddit if I was at 999 normal wins because apparently I have the chance to play with a Riot employee, so I posted on reddit and was told to post here. I'm not sure if this is true and I wanted clarification on the matter, I was also curious if it was possible to let my friend play in the same game because he is about to hit level 30. Just curious and hopeful.

replies.body: It's true! When would you be down to play? And of course your friend can play, too! :]
she will carry you, hella fish skills

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=kEHXAbGk,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-05T00:42:44.474+0000)
>
> It's true! When would you be down to play? And of course your friend can play, too! :]

{{summoner:3}} Sorry, I just read this as I played one game and now I feel like I messed up real bad. Can we play 1001 Dalmatians style and celebrate it anyways? I would understand if you said no because it was my fault for not reading, but I'm just curious because personally, I think if it were 1002, it wouldn't be as special as 1000 or 1001. 

Up to you of course if you're still able. If you are, it couldn't be tomorrow, May 5th, because I'm seeing Avengers with my sister, but maybe sometime this week. Of course, only if you want to do it, and if my friend plays, it would be his first game as a level 30. 

Sorry for my ultimate tardiness and I would understand if the opportunity is gone because I'm not the only one to hit 1000. I promise not to play another SR game until a response within 2 weeks though!

Haha, absolutely, we can still play! 

Lemme add you and you can message me when you're around to play! :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=kEHXAbGk,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2015-05-05T17:10:21.013+0000)
>
> Haha, absolutely, we can still play! 
> 
> Lemme add you and you can message me when you're around to play! :]

Awesome! I'll be on in a few moments and I'll see if I can play just before I go to the movies. Thanks for getting back and forgiving me of my sins.
I don't know what number to use anymore, Normal wins or normal wins with Team Builder wins. :(
I randomly played with one yesterday (or Saturday... I don't remember) in a Ranked. I was a little starstruck! I think it made me try a bit harder too. We won!
I'm sure you can find a few whether you have 300 wins or 1000
You can honestly play with them whenever... people just always found it "special" for some reason when they were about to hit 1000.
